original_title: Mötley Crüe - XXX 30 Years Of Girls Girls Girls
overview: Includes the digitally remastered edition of the album plus five bonus tracks, a DVD that includes never before seen interview footage from Nikki Sixx, Tommy Lee, and Doc McGhee about the making of the album and the most explosive era of their career and the unedited versions of "Girls Girls Girls", "Wild Side", and "You're All I Need" music videos.
title: Mötley Crüe - XXX 30 Years Of Girls Girls Girls
